title: Macron Begins 4-Day India Visit, Rafale Deal & AI Cooperation To Deepen India-France Strategic Ties
description: French President Emmanuel Macron began a four-day India visit aimed at strengthening defence, AI and Indo-Pacific cooperation. Talks with Prime Minister Narendra Modi may include a 114-Rafale jet deal and new technology partnerships. Several agreements are expected to boost trade, innovation and long-term strategic ties.

title: AI both ‘idiot’ and ‘savant’, can replace human experts with virtual workers, UN official warns
description: UN Under-Secretary-General for Digital and Emerging Technologies Amandeep Singh Gill was speaking at a lecture organised on the sideline of India's AI Summit Monday.

title: KPMG puts thousands of dollars fine on partner for using AI to pass AI test; says: It’s a very hard thing to get...
description: A partner at KPMG Australia has been slapped with a A$10,000 (roughly $7,000) fine after using AI tools to cheat on an internal training course that was, ironically enough, about AI itself. The partner, who hasn’t been named, uploaded training materials into an AI platform to generate answers for the exam, according to a report by the Financial Times. He was also made to retake the test. But he wasn’t the only one cutting corners. KPMG confirmed that more than two dozen staff at its Australian arm have been caught using AI to game internal exams since July this financial [...]

title: Entertainment News | AI India Impact Summit 2026: Panchayat Ministry Highlights 'Sabhasaar' for Gram Sabha Transparency
description: Get latest articles and stories on Entertainment at LatestLY. New Delhi witnessed a unique blend of technology and culture at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, where artists performed 'Sarpanch Ki Chaupal, AI Ka Kamaal', highlighting the transformative role of artificial intelligence in grassroots governance.

title: Amitabh Kant urges global south to build own ai models, warns of rising inequality
description: Daijiworld Media Network – New DelhiNew Delhi, Feb 17: Former NITI Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant on Tuesday called on India and other countries in the Global South to develop their own artificial intelligence (AI) models using local data, stressing that such an approach is essential to e....
